1841379 THE MOTOR VEHICLES (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 39 OF 2001 [ 11th September, 2001.]
An Act further to amend the Motor Vehicles Act, 1988.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
660863 1 Short title and commencement.-
363807 1This Act may be called the Motor Vehicles (Amendment) Act, 2001.
189610 2It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
976052 2 Amendment of section 66.- In section 66 of the Motor Vehicles Act, 1988 (59 of 1988) (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act), in sub- section (3), clause
1936696 1shall be omitted.
825226 3Amendment of section 67.- In section 67 of the principal Act, in sub- section 1, in clause (i), the proviso shall be omitted. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
